name: Serpent Blade
description:
Synopsis

In the moon of Calisto, Earth's scientists found the remains of an ancient being known as Kryperion. They revivied the creature with cyber tech but failed to control it, bringing the end of humanity. Kryperion awaits in its lair deep in Calisto, and only you, the Nameless Samurai, can cut through its metal and avenge humanity.

"Serpent Blade" is an original hack n' slash set in a cyberpunk world with cosmic horror touches, where you engage in an epic battle against a relentless final boss. 

Will you accept the challenge and defeat Kryperion?

Controls Keyboard and Mouse:
  • WASD -- Move
  • "Shift" -- Dash
  • "Left Click" -- Attack
  • "Right Click" -- Parry shield
